entry.title: If you applied to the @pressstartcap x D_D Fellowship and want an in-depth review of your application, tweet the hashtag #ReviewMyApp below. 👇👇...
entry.summary:
If you applied to the @pressstartcap x D_D Fellowship and want an in-depth review of your application, tweet the hashtag #ReviewMyApp below. 👇👇👇 If you haven't applied yet, you have until 11:59pm on May 21st (this Sunday). Here's the link to apply: https://app.deform.cc/form/d7547d9f-e795-44de-868d-ed903d24859d/
